articles.title: A 45-foot asteroid will pass very close to Earth today, NASA alerts
articles.snippet: A small asteroid will pass relatively close to Earth, highlighting the importance of global tracking and research. Scientists continue monitoring near-Earth objects to ensure planetary safety.

articles.title: Israel intercepts 39 aid boats heading for Gaza, organizers say, sparking criticism
articles.snippet: (3rd UPDATE) The Global Sumud Flotilla, transporting medicine and food to Gaza, consists of over 40 civilian boats with about 500 parliamentarians, lawyers, and activists, including climate campaigner
